meanings.definition: A form of meditation in which one observes sensations in the body to develop insight and mindfulness.
meanings.sent1: During vipassana, I focused on feeling my breath and heartbeat.
meanings.sent2: Many people find peace and clarity through vipassana meditation.
meanings.sent3: While doing vipassana, I realized my stomach was growling loudly.
meanings.sent4: Vipassana is like peeling layers of an onion to reveal inner truths.
meanings.sent5: The teacher guided us through vipassana, helping us connect with our inner selves.

meanings.definition: The practice of self-transformation through self-observation and self-awareness.
meanings.sent1: Through vipassana, I learned to observe my thoughts without judgment.
meanings.sent2: Vipassana is a journey of self-discovery and personal growth.
meanings.sent3: I tried vipassana, but ended up observing my cat's funny antics instead.
meanings.sent4: Embarking on vipassana is like embarking on a voyage within oneself.
meanings.sent5: The retreat center offered a transformative vipassana experience for all participants.
